LF Vivillon patterns, not fussy on quality, just colour-matchy or default balls
XYORAS
So I was just given Continental, Plains, Modern, Meadow and River Vivillon from a very generous Safari Code stranger. It re-kindled the intention I'd had when XY came out to collect all patterns. At the time I'd thought "Finally, a game I can play at release and get the full experience!" Except back then, I had the time but not the money, and then when I had the money, I didn't have the time. Welcome to adulthood. 10 years later, here we are, impending shutdown, trying my luck.
LF Snow, Tundra, Elegant, Marine, Sandstorm, Monsoon, Savanna, Sun, Ocean
FT My native Vivillon is Garden. Happy to attempt any requests. New to trading over the internets, please be patient with me :)

{ "Sender's Pokemon" :  [ { "Pokemon" : "Vivillon" , "IV" : [] , "nature" : [] , "gender" : [] , "ability" : [] , "hidden ability" : [] , "language" : [] , "form" : ["Garden"] , "special" : [] , "pokeball" : [] , "shiny" : false} ] , "Requested Pokemon" : [ { "Pokemon" : "Vivillon" , "IV" : [] , "nature" : [] , "gender" : [] , "ability" : [] , "hidden ability" : [] , "language" : [] , "form" : [ "snow" , "tundra" , "elegant" , "marine" , "sandstorm" , "monsoon" , "savanna" , "sun" , "ocean"] , "special" : [] , "pokeball" : [] , "shiny" : false } ] , "version" : "XYORAS" , "action" : "trade" }

LF: Former Titan Great Tusk with custom OT. FT: Former Titan Iron Treads with your custom OT.
SV

I'm looking to collect a Former Titan Great Tusk. This is specifically the Great Tusk with a Titan Mark that you can catch in the desert in Scarlet. I also want it to have my custom OT and be caught in an Ultra Ball.

I realize this will be a time investment for someone to get for me, so in exchange I'd be happy to offer you the Iron Treads equivalent. Or would you prefer something else instead? Let me know what else you would be interested in trading for and I'll see if I can get it for you.

{ "Sender's Pokemon" :  [ { "Pokemon" : "Iron Treads" , "IV" : [] , "nature" : [] , "gender" : [] , "ability" : [] , "hidden ability" : [] , "language" : [] , "form" : ["regular"] , "special" : ["Titan Mark"] , "pokeball" :[] , "shiny" : false } ] , "Requested Pokemon" : [ { "Pokemon" : "Great Tusk" , "IV" : [] , "nature" : [] , "gender" : [] , "ability" : [] , "hidden ability" : [] , "language" : [] , "form" : ["regular"] , "special" : ["Titan Mark"] , "pokeball" :[ "ultra ball"] , "shiny" : false } ] , "version" : "SV" , "action" : "trade" }

Pokemon giveaways Aprimons + More
Giveaway

Just giving away my latest breedjects if anyone wants otherwise they get released to make space.

If you wish to have any of these breedjects send me your IGN, Link Code and which ones you would like. (if its a double up mon let me know which ball you prefer and ability.)

*please also note these mons can range from 1 perfect iv to 5 imperfect.

If you are requesting mons please know this can take time, people will cue up before and after you so be ready at your time so I can efficently give out pokemon to all. Please note if you take to much time to connect I will skip you if there is a line.

* If it is listed I still have this list is updated after every trade once I run out of a certain mon it is deleted

Current Stock:

Aprimon Stock

Frigibax - Lure Ball - Jolly

Zorua - Moon Ball - Modest

Rockruff - Beast Ball - Adamant

Mankey - Moon Ball - Careful

Scorbunny - Fast Ball - Jolly (HA)

Tinkatink - Dream Ball - Adamant

Tauros (Fire) - Level Ball - Adamant

Zoura (Hisuian) - Dream Ball - Timid

Charcadet - Beast Ball - Adamant

Gible - Lure Ball - Adamant (HA)

Cyndaquil - Level Ball - Timid (HA)

Uncommon Balls

Larvesta - Net Ball - Timid

Wooper - Premier Ball - Relaxed (HA)

Foongus - Nest Ball - Bold (HA)

Tabulb - Premier Ball - Bold

Starters

Sprigatito - Poke Ball - Jolly

Fuecoco - Poke Ball - Calm

[Giveaway] Tera Raid Support Umbreon x16 SV
Giveaway (Closed)

Status: 1 left unclaimed. Will be able to trade between about 12-5 CST today.

Hello!

I have 16 Umbreon in Scarlet that are kitted to be Tera Raid support mons. They're from a variety of different games, OTs, and in various balls.

Every one has:

    Screech

    Helping Hand (except one who has Yawn instead)

    2 varying support moves, mostly via TM (Taunt, Fake Tears, Spite, Toxic, Mud Slap etc.)

    A held item to generally help in tera raids

Please note: Levels vary from 45 when screech is learned to 100. They will be given one/person in a random order. You will just need your own XP candies to level them to be ready for 5/6* raids.

Comment a link code with your request below and then use your Umbreon to help out your fellow raiders!
